Docs.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Determines if a change will cause a structural change to the document and if not, applies it to the existing tree. If a structural change would occur, automatically starts a reparse.
Docs.returns: A value indicating the result of the incremental parse.
